Compilation info
Cool cats, hipsters, hustlers, be-boppers and the blues - how jazz influenced the "beat" generation and vice versa.

1 Dizzie Gillespie & Orchestra* - Oop-Pop-A-Da
2 Charlie Ventura & Orchestra - Ha
3 Sonny Rollins - St. Thomas
4 David Amram Quintet & Lynn Sheffield - Pull My Daisy
5 Ben Webster - Cadillac Slim
6 Bud Powell - Oblivion
7 Thelonious Monk - Hackensack
8 Duke Ellington - I Got It Bad And That Ain't Good
9 Kenny Clarke - Oop-Bop-Sh-Bam
10 Lucky Thompson - Boppin' The Blues
11 Lambert, Hendricks & Bavan - Yeh Yeh
12 Lee Konitz - Lost Henri
13 Charles Mingus - Tijuana Gift Shop
14 Coleman Hawkins - Jumping For Jane
15 Shorty Rogers - Chiquito Loco
16 Dizzy Gillespie - A Night In Tunisia
17 Coleman Hawkins & Orchestra* - Half Step Down, Please
18 52nd St. All Stars* - Allen's Alley
19 Gerry Mulligan - Walkin' Shoes
20 Henry Mancini - The Beat
